ygData.subject: Re: Ice Comet
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry Ziffnab, yas need to read that EQ site just a little better ;)  It doesn t say IS implemented, it says WILL be implemented.  Specialization is not
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry Ziffnab, yas need to read that EQ site just a little better ;) It
doesn't say IS implemented, it says WILL be implemented. Specialization is
not currently working in the game, but should be added shortly, we all hope
;)

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard


----- Original Message -----
From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 10:53 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Ice Comet


> From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>
>
> Goto the official EQ website and read in the Developer section. You
> will notice that SPECIALIZATION has been implemented now for our use.
> Yes, it was not working before, but is working now and explains how it
> works.
>
> - Ziffnab, Dispellor of Rumors
